dcterms:creator: Christian Zimmermann
Duygu Ceylan
Jimei Yang
Bryan Russell
Max Argus
Thomas Brox
dcterms:description: A large-scale multiview hand dataset with 3D hands annotations, popularly used by 3D hand reconstruction studies. The training set contains 33k samples collected by 08 cameras in a green-screen studio environment, which are further enhanced by replacing the backgrounds, leading to an overall 132k samples. The evaluation set contains 4K samples including both in-door and out-door in-the-wild scenarios.
dcterms:title: FreiHAND

dcterms:creator: Shreyas Hampali
Mahdi Rad
Markus Oberweger
Vincent Lepetit
dcterms:description: Markerless hand-object interaction dataset containing 3D poses for both hand and object, released in 2020. The sequences in the dataset came from the YCB dataset and were collected by single or multiple RGBD cameras.
dcterms:title: HO3D

dcterms:creator: Donglai Xiang
Hanbyul Joo
Yaser Sheikh
dcterms:description: A dataset that captures both the 3D body and hand poses without using markers. The dataset recorded 40 subjects for 2.5 minutes and included 111K hand images and their 3D pose.
dcterms:title: MTC

dcterms:creator: Christian Zimmermann
Thomas Brox
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset for better annotation quality, utilizing 20 different 3D characters performing 39 actions, containing around 44k images in total.
dcterms:title: RHD

dcterms:creator: Gyeongsik Moon
Shoou-I Yu
He Wen
Takaaki Shiratori
Kyoung Mu Lee
dcterms:description: A large-scale real-captured hand interaction dataset containing 2.6M labeled RGB images showing single or two interacting hands, collected using more than 80 cameras in a precisely calibrated multi-view studio.
dcterms:title: InterHand2.6M

dcterms:creator: Shreyas Hampali
Sayan Deb Sarkar
Vincent Lepetit
dcterms:description: A dataset that improves the accuracy of hand-object annotations of the HO-3D dataset, released in 2021.
dcterms:title: H2O3D

dcterms:creator: Yu-Wei Chao
Wei Yang
Yu Xiang
Pavlo Molchanov
Ankur Handa
Jonathan Tremblay
Yashraj S Narang
Karl Van Wyk
Umar Iqbal
Stan Birchfield
dcterms:description: A benchmark for capturing hand grasping of objects, containing 582k RGBD images for 10 subjects grasping 20 different objects.
dcterms:title: DexYCB

dcterms:creator: Sheng Jin
Lumin Xu
Jin Xu
Can Wang
Wentao Liu
Chen Qian
Wanli Ouyang
Ping Luo
dcterms:description: A dataset for whole-body human pose estimation in the wild, containing 200k RGB images with 250k instances.
dcterms:title: COCO-Wholebody

dcterms:creator: Hao-Shu Fang
Jiefeng Li
Hongyang Tang
Chao Xu
Haoyi Zhu
Yuliang Xiu
Yong-Lu Li
Cewu Lu
dcterms:description: An in-the-wild RGB dataset for full-body human-object interaction, containing 50k training and 5k test instances.
dcterms:title: Halpe

dcterms:creator: Tomas Simon
Hanbyul Joo
Iain Matthews
Yaser Sheikh
dcterms:description: A mixing dataset containing in-the-wild, multiview studio collected and synthetic RGB images, with 11k rendered synthetic samples and 2.8k manually annotated in-the-wild images.
dcterms:title: MPII NZSL
